ComicInfo.Title: Foreword; A Short History of Execution; Decapitation; A Visit with the Hanging Judge; Firing Squad; Old Sparky; Capital Punishment - It's a Gas; Lethal Injection; Last Suppers; Stupid Murders; Look Out! It's the Killer Postmen!; The Wide World of Death!; Teen Suicide; Suicide; The Quality of Mercy; The Right to Die; They Call Him Dr. Death; The Eggshell Skull; Sickness Unto Death I: Black Death; Sickness Unto Death II: Tuberculosis; Sickness Unto Death III: Typhoid Mary; Sickness Unto Death IV: The Future; The Art of War; Onward (Your Religion Here) Soldiers; One-Way Ticket; Spontaneous Human Combustion; Weird Death I; Weird Death II; Weird Death III; Weird Death IV; Weird Death V; Weird Death VI; Weird Death VII; Weird Death VIII; Weird Death IX; The Definition of Death?; Anatomy of an Autopsy; Embalming; Six Feet Under; The Watery Grave; Cremation; Mummification; Cryonics: The Frozen Dead; A Walking Tour of Highgate Cemetery; Le Cimetière du Père Lachaise; A Poetic Journey Through the Protestant Cemetery in Rome; The Vienna Funeral Museum; Greetings from Green-Wood Cemetery; Forest Lawn; Where to Go; Dead But Not Departed; They Saved Sakharov's Brain; The Disposal Dilemma; You Are What You Eat; Dead Love; The Vampire!; Are Zombies Real?; Soccer: The Sport That Kills!; From Cradle to Grave; The Art of Death; Heaven and Hereafter; Dante Goes to Hell; Near-Death Experiences; Famous Last Words; The Last Words of Dutch Schultz; That Line Is Dead; Mike Montaigne Looks at Death
ComicInfo.Summary:
Short history of different forms of execution.
History of decapitation as a method of execution.
Judge Issac Parker, the famous "Hanging Judge" tells about hanging as a method of execution.
Information about how firing squads work.
How an electric chair works.
Information about how poisonous gas works.
Information about how executions with lethal injections work.
Information about some of the strangest last suppers of convicted criminals.
Stories about some really stupid murders that have happened.
Information about infamous Postal employees who killed their co-workers.
True stories about people who have died on live television.
Why teenagers commit suicide.
Information about why people commit suicide.
Facts about Euthenasia.
Information about the founder of the Hemlock Society.
Information about Dr. Jack Kevorkian.
Information about how fragile the human skull can be.
Information about the Black Plauge during the Middle Ages.
Information about Tuberculosis.
Information about Typhoid Mary.
Information about current diseases, including HIV.
Information about massacres during various wars.
Information about various massacres committed in the name of religion.
Information about various accidents that caused massive deaths.
Information about Spontaneous Human Combustion.
Weird ways people have died.
Weird ways people have died.
Weird ways people have died.
Weird ways people have died.
Weird ways people have died.
Weird ways people have died.
Weird ways people have died.
Weird ways people have died.
Weird ways people have died.
Information about the Medical definition of death.
How an Autopsy is preformed.
How embalming works.
Weird ways people have been buried.
Information about burial at sea.
Information about cremation.
Information about Mummification.
Information about how Cryonics works.
History of Highgate Cemetary.
History of Le Cimetiere on Pere Lachaise.
History of Protestant Cemetary in Rome.
History of the Vienna Funeral Museum.
History of GreenWood Cemetary in Brooklyn N.Y.
History of Forest Lawn Cemetary in Hollywood Hills, CA.
Quick tour of several historical European cemetaries.
True Stories about people whe were kept around after they died.
Information about Organ Donation.
Information about how some killers have tried to get rid of the body.
Stories about true life cannibalism.
Stories about people who have performed Necrophilia.
True facts about Vampires and Vampirism.
Information about Zombies.
Facts about people who have died at Soccer events.
Information about the Black Plauge.
Stories about weird gravestones.
Information about how different religions view the hereafter.
Dante's vertion of Hell.
Stories about Near Death Experiences.
Famous People's famous last words.
The last words of Dutch Schultz
Information about people who claim to have spoken with deceased relatives.
Some philosophy from Michel De Montaigne.
